pageProps.title: Onion Testosterone Booster: How to use Onions to increase Testosterone
pageProps.metaDesc:
Let's talk about how you can boost testosterone simply by eating more onions. And, of course, testosterone is a significant issue for men as they age. Every year, by the age of 40, your testosterone level drops by 1%.

And testosterone does a lot more than just increase libido. It is in charge of male characteristics such as body hair. It is also present in muscle.

There are a lot of people who are going the testosterone route and getting testosterone pellets and taking testosterone injections, and I'm not a fan of those therapies because when you start taking a hormone, you inactivate the gland that makes that hormone.
